suncertify.network
Class NetworkClient

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              suncertify.network.NetworkClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, NetworkClientFactory
public class NetworkClient
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements NetworkClientFactory

This class is the implementation of the client network factory which returns clients with connectivity to the database.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Pedro Oliveira
See Also:
NetworkClientFactory, UnicastRemoteObject, Serialized Form

          Creates an instance of this factory with the specified database file path.
 
Method Summary
 DBRemote getClient()
          Returns the reference to a remote instance of the remote database connection class which has all the methods that can be called remotely.

Constructor Detail

NetworkClient

public NetworkClient(java.lang.String dbPath)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Creates an instance of this factory with the specified database file path.

Parameters:
dbPath - the path in the remote machine to database physical file.
Throws:
